data.expected_result: Discord should cancel the upload and tell you that only files below 50mb are allowed
data.short_description: Discord crashes if you try to upload a huge file that greatly exceeds the 50mb upload limit (Try files of around 500mb). Alternatively the upload gets stuck on Queuing for a while and then crashes.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a huge file on your phone (in my case a zip file of ~500mb) - Select the file and try to upload it
